Preterit.text: Mraǧaʕlan lu qonsolos d Almanya d obeli wiza. (İlyas p.c)

Mraǧaʕli li dawle doboli mʕawana. (İlyas p.c)
Mraǧaʕlan,  huwwe daṣṭə̀r diḏan, edi aṯina. ‘We applied, they gave us permission, then we came.’ (Nisane 2018_07_08_au_NE_1F ln. 245)

Infectum.text: Kǝmraǧʕina aḥna kul šato li dawle d obo mʕawana li zraʕa.(İlyas p.c)
Kǝmraǧʕina reǧoʕo li dawle kul šato lašan d nofaq mʕawana lu ʕamo. (İlyas p.c)
